languages.text: "Ох, леди Кассия, напрасно вы считаете такое поведение чем-то достойным... мир гораздо сложнее, чем его рисует себе юность".
"Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."
languages.original_text: "Ох, леди Кассия, напрасно вы считаете такое поведение чем-то достойным... мир гораздо сложнее, чем его рисует себе юность".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “哦，卡西娅女士，你不该认为这样的行为是光荣之举……年轻人总会认为世界的美好的，但现实却要复杂得多。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."

traits.locale_text: “哦，卡西娅女士，你不该认为这样的行为是光荣之举……年轻人总会认为世界的美好的，但现实却要复杂得多。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, dame Cassia, vous ne devriez pas qualifier sa conduite d'honorable... Les jeunes ont tendance à se faire une certaine idée du monde, mais la réalité est autrement plus complexe. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, dame Cassia, vous ne devriez pas qualifier sa conduite d'honorable... Les jeunes ont tendance à se faire une certaine idée du monde, mais la réalité est autrement plus complexe. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, Lady Cassia, Ihr solltet nicht glauben, dass ein solches Verhalten in irgendeiner Weise ehrenwert ist ... Die Jugend malt sich selbst ein hübsches Bild der Welt, doch die Realität ist weitaus komplexer."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, Lady Cassia, Ihr solltet nicht glauben, dass ein solches Verhalten in irgendeiner Weise ehrenwert ist ... Die Jugend malt sich selbst ein hübsches Bild der Welt, doch die Realität ist weitaus komplexer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁ、レディ・カシア。そのような行為を名誉と思ってはいけません…若者はきれいな世界像を描いていますが、現実はもっと複雑です」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、レディ・カシア。そのような行為を名誉と思ってはいけません…若者はきれいな世界像を描いていますが、現実はもっと複雑です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, Lady Cassia, debería saber que esa conducta no es en absoluto honorable... la juventud tiene una visión del mundo mucho menos compleja que la realidad».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, Lady Cassia, debería saber que esa conducta no es en absoluto honorable... la juventud tiene una visión del mundo mucho menos compleja que la realidad».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."

languages.text: "Leydi Cassia, böylesi bir eylemin şerefli olduğunu düşünme lütfen... Gençken dünya, gözümüze epey güzel gelebilir. Ancak gerçek, çok daha karmaşık bir yapıya sahiptir."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lady Cassia, you should not think such conduct is in any way honourable... Youth paints for itself a pretty picture of the world, but the reality is far more complex."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Cassia, böylesi bir eylemin şerefli olduğunu düşünme lütfen... Gençken dünya, gözümüze epey güzel gelebilir. Ancak gerçek, çok daha karmaşık bir yapıya sahiptir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
